pkgmetadata.longdescription: Human readable data presentation // This package provides clear, informative and colorful ways of presenting the contents of data.frame, list, environment etc. in the prompt. Ideally this package should be used in terminals supporting xterm 256 colour mode, e.g. the standard Ubuntu terminal. The Mac OS X terminal (as of Snow Leopard) only support ANSI colour, which still works but doesn't look as nice. On Windows systems no colouring is supported. If the output of functions like 'whos' is a mess or somehow doesn't look like it should check the help for the functions 'style' and 'style.mode' of the 'xtermStyle' package.
